title: Fact Check: Did Mahesh Bhatt go to Malaysia to meet Islamic preacher Zakir Naik? | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
NewsMobile fact-checked the picture and found it to be old.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture on Getty Images.

According to the caption, the picture was taken in 2010 in Mumbai.

“MUMBAI, INDIA – JUNE 22, 2010: Islamic preacher Dr Zakir Naik, filmmaker Mahesh Bhatt and advocate Majid Menon at Press Club to protest against the UK government denying a visa to Naik. (Photo by Vijayanand Gupta/Hindustan Times via Getty Images)” the caption read.

The above information proves that the claim attached to the picture is false.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
